meanings.definition: The study or practice of the medicinal and therapeutic use of plants.
meanings.sent1: In herbology, we learn how plants can be used for healing purposes.
meanings.sent2: She decided to pursue a career in herbology to help people with natural remedies.
meanings.sent3: The herbology class had a funny moment when a student mistook a cooking herb for a medicinal plant.
meanings.sent4: Herbology is like a treasure hunt for the best natural remedies hidden in plants.
meanings.sent5: The professor made herbology come alive by showing the students the power of herbal medicine.

meanings.definition: The branch of botany that deals with herbs.
meanings.sent1: Botanists specializing in herbology focus on studying different types of herbs.
meanings.sent2: Herbology is an important field for understanding the properties of various herbs.
meanings.sent3: The herbology department at the university always smells like a fragrant garden.
meanings.sent4: In the world of plants, herbology is like the detective work of uncovering herb secrets.
meanings.sent5: The book on herbology painted a vivid picture of the diverse world of herbs.
